languages.text: Концентрация газа оказалась слишком высокой — он пробивался даже сквозь фильтры наших респираторов. Стоило нам войти, как начался хаос. Солдаты начали стрелять по своим же товарищам, пытаясь уничтожить видимые только им кошмары. Сам я узрел... Нечто, что не должно описывать здесь. Когда газ выветрился, док был зачищен, но мы понесли тяжелые потери.

traits.locale_text: Концентрация газа оказалась слишком высокой — он пробивался даже сквозь фильтры противогазов. Стоило нам войти, как начался хаос. Многие солдаты начали стрелять по своим же товарищам, пытаясь уничтожить видимые только им кошмары. Когда газ выветрился, док был зачищен, но мы понесли тяжелые потери.

languages.text: But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.
languages.original_text: Концентрация газа оказалась слишком высокой — он пробивался даже сквозь фильтры наших респираторов. Стоило нам войти, как начался хаос. Солдаты начали стрелять по своим же товарищам, пытаясь уничтожить видимые только им кошмары. Сам я узрел... Нечто, что не должно описывать здесь. Когда газ выветрился, док был зачищен, но мы понесли тяжелые потери.

traits.locale_text: But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

languages.text: 但毒气的浓度实在是太高了，即便是我们的呼吸器，也无法完全过滤毒素的影响。我们刚一冲进去，灾难便接踵而至。我们的士兵朝自己人开火，试图消灭他们眼前所看到的噩梦景象。我也看到了可怕的东西……我就不在这里具体描述了。毒气散去之后，我们占领了码头，但也遭受了惨重的伤亡。
languages.original_text: But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

traits.locale_text: 但毒气的浓度实在是太高了，即便是我们的呼吸器，也无法完全过滤毒素的影响。我们刚一冲进去，灾难便接踵而至。我们的士兵朝自己人开火，试图消灭他们眼前所看到的噩梦景象。我也看到了可怕的东西……我就不在这里具体描述了。毒气散去之后，我们占领了码头，但也遭受了惨重的伤亡。

languages.text: Cependant, la concentration de gaz était encore trop élevée et le filtre de nos respirateurs ne pouvait pas entièrement nous en protéger. Dès que nous sommes entrés, tout a viré à la catastrophe. Nos soldats se sont mis à se tirer les uns sur les autres, cherchant à détruire les cauchemars qu'ils imaginaient devant eux. J'ai vu... des choses que je refuse de décrire ici. Lorsque le gaz s'est enfin dissipé, le quai était à nous, mais au prix de pertes considérables.
languages.original_text: But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, la concentration de gaz était encore trop élevée et le filtre de nos respirateurs ne pouvait pas entièrement nous en protéger. Dès que nous sommes entrés, tout a viré à la catastrophe. Nos soldats se sont mis à se tirer les uns sur les autres, cherchant à détruire les cauchemars qu'ils imaginaient devant eux. J'ai vu... des choses que je refuse de décrire ici. Lorsque le gaz s'est enfin dissipé, le quai était à nous, mais au prix de pertes considérables.

languages.text: しかし、ガスの濃度が高すぎた――呼吸装置のフィルターでも完全に遮断することはできなかった。入ってすぐに災難が起こった。我々の兵士たちは目に映る悪夢を破壊しようと仲間たちに発砲した。ここには書けないような光景を見てしまった…ガスが晴れたとき、我々はドックを制圧したが、被った損失は大きかった。
languages.original_text: But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

traits.locale_text: しかし、ガスの濃度が高すぎた――呼吸装置のフィルターでも完全に遮断することはできなかった。入ってすぐに災難が起こった。我々の兵士たちは目に映る悪夢を破壊しようと仲間たちに発砲した。ここには書けないような光景を見てしまった…ガスが晴れたとき、我々はドックを制圧したが、被った損失は大きかった。

languages.text: Sin embargo, la concentración de gas seguía siendo demasiado elevada. Ni siquiera los filtros de los respiradores podían bloquearlo por completo. Se produjo el desastre en cuanto entramos. Nuestros soldados se dispararon entre ellos, intentando acabar con pesadillas que solo existían en sus mentes. Vi... cosas de las que no hablaré aquí. Cuando el gas se dispersó, el puerto era nuestro, pero habíamos sufrido gran cantidad de bajas.
languages.original_text: But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, la concentración de gas seguía siendo demasiado elevada. Ni siquiera los filtros de los respiradores podían bloquearlo por completo. Se produjo el desastre en cuanto entramos. Nuestros soldados se dispararon entre ellos, intentando acabar con pesadillas que solo existían en sus mentes. Vi... cosas de las que no hablaré aquí. Cuando el gas se dispersó, el puerto era nuestro, pero habíamos sufrido gran cantidad de bajas.

languages.text: Doch die Gaskonzentration war noch zu hoch, selbst die Filter in unseren Atemmasken konnten das Gas nicht vollständig aufhalten. Kaum gingen wir hinein, begann die Katastrophe. Unsere Soldaten eröffneten das Feuer auf ihre eigenen Kameraden, in dem verzweifelten Versuch, die Albträume vor ihrem inneren Auge zu vernichten. Ich habe ... Dinge gesehen, die ich hier nicht beschreiben werde. Als das Gas verflogen war, gehörte das Dock zwar uns, doch wir hatten gewaltige Verluste erlitten.
languages.original_text: But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.

traits.locale_text: Doch die Gaskonzentration war noch zu hoch, selbst die Filter in unseren Atemmasken konnten das Gas nicht vollständig aufhalten. Kaum gingen wir hinein, begann die Katastrophe. Unsere Soldaten eröffneten das Feuer auf ihre eigenen Kameraden, in dem verzweifelten Versuch, die Albträume vor ihrem inneren Auge zu vernichten. Ich habe ... Dinge gesehen, die ich hier nicht beschreiben werde. Als das Gas verflogen war, gehörte das Dock zwar uns, doch wir hatten gewaltige Verluste erlitten.

languages.text: Ancak gaz yoğunluğu hâlâ çok fazlaydı. Solunum maskemizin filtreleri dahi gazı tam anlamıyla engelleyemiyordu. Girer girmez felaket baş gösterdi. Askerlerimiz, yoldaşlarına ateş açarak zihin gözüyle gördükleri kâbusları defetmeye çalıştı. Ben... Burada tarif etmeye kalkmayacağım şeylere şahit oldum. Gaz ortadan kalktığında rıhtım bizimdi, zayiatımız ise çoktu.
languages.original_text: But the gas concentration was still too high — even the filters in our respirators couldn't block it entirely. As soon as we entered, disaster ensued. Our soldiers opened fire on our own, trying to destroy the nightmares in their mind's eye. I saw... things I won't describe here. When the gas cleared, the dock was ours, but the losses we had suffered were great.
